verse.name: v1
verse.lines: Johnny Miner, you were born Never to see the rising dawn, Now it's time that you were gone, So farewell, Johnny Miner.

verse.name: c1
verse.lines: Farewell Durham, Yorkshire, too, Nottingham, the same to you Scotland, South Wales, bid adieu, And farewell, Johnny Miner.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: You struggled hard with slate and shale, Lungs turned black and faces pale, Now your body's up for sale, And farewell, Johnny Miner.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: They promised you the earth some time To work down in their stinkin' mine, Now the justice for their crime Is farewell, Johnny Miner.

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: Cheer up John, it won't be bad: Unemployment isn't hard - They'll treat you well in the knacker's yard, So farewell, Johnny Miner.
